DIY Air Compressor

DIY Air Compressor Workshop

Build your own functional air compressor using recycled materials, primarily repurposed gas bottles. This workshop teaches welding, plumbing, and electrical skills while creating a practical tool for your workshop or garage.

What You'll Learn

  • Welding techniques for creating airtight seals
  • Plumbing connections and fittings for pressurized systems
  • Electrical assembly following safety protocols
  • Installing pressure regulators and safety valves
  • Working safely with recycled pressurized containers
  • Modular design: adding compressors or storage tanks later

Workshop Details

Each participant fabricates their own air compressor and takes it home. The finished units include essential safety equipment: pressure regulators and safety valves.

The design is modular, allowing you to add additional compressors for increased airflow or larger storage tanks as your needs grow.

This workshop covers introductory welding and is suitable for beginners. All tools and protective equipment are provided.
